price: Aane, Memaa saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne wͻn agyanom gyee wͻn ani kͻpem sε Nokorε no ne Ɔsomafoͻ a ͻda (nsεm no) adi pefee no baa wͻn hͻ.
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
